name: postcss-url-version
description: A simple PostCSS plugin that adds a hash on every url property

scripts.update: npm install $(npm outdated | cut -d' ' -f 1 | sed '1d' | xargs -I '$' echo '$@latest' | xargs echo)  --save-exact

author: Dimitris Grammatikogiannis <d.grammatiko@gmail.com> (https://dgrammatiko.online/)
